title: Qube Social Network
description: Social media feed with sorting algorithm
longDescription: Social media app that allows users to create and edit posts, like and make comments, follow other users, search for content, and upload a profile pic and biography. Features efficient database CRUD, infinite scroll that dynamically loads posts in the feed, and a sorting algorithm that sorts posts by their relevance (detailed in the repo's README).

title: Jetpack Joyride
longDescription: This game is the final project for my data structures & algorithms class and is based on the popular mobile game Jetpack Joyride.
